name: Peg Puzzle - Vehicles
description:
Vehicle Puzzle is an appropriate puzzle game for everyone.

KEY FEATURES

- 3 Different Types of Puzzles

- 21 Different Puzzles

- 3 Different Themes: Construction, City, Air and Sea...

- 20 Vehicles

- Attractive and Colourful Graphics

- Joyful Background Music

- High-Quality Sounds of Vehicles

- Feedbacks that are Fostering Attention.

- Friendly User Interface

- ALL FREE. No In-App Purchase.
